text: María Martha Serra Lima (December 19, 1944 – November 2, 2017) was an Argentine singer. She was born in Buenos Aires. Serra Lima was first signed on to a record label in 1977, and became famous across Latin America and in Spain during the 1970s and 1980s. Her albums became hits in Mexico, Puerto Rico, Chile, Colombia, Venezuela, and elsewhere in the region, apart from her home country.Clarín (14 January 2007) Serra Lima died in Miami, Florida on November 2, 2017 at the age of 72.Murió la cantante María Martha Serra Lima ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Singers from Buenos Aires
title: María Martha Serra Lima
